name: Flight Attend-A-Thon
description:
Prove your passenger-pampering prowess in this high-flying, cart-pumping competition! Deliver the goods, keep your supplies well stocked, and squeeze by passengers rushing to the lavatory. Buckle up because it's going to be a full flight. ITS FLIGHT ATTEND-A-THON!

============================

All code, audio, and graphics made in 72 hours by Evergreen Games


Tools:
Code - Unity
Graphics - Aseprite
Audio - Logic, Zoom H6 Recorder

Thanks for playing!
